Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    class Simulation create new game object ave_Battle: average battles ave_Wars: average wars ave_doubleWars: average double wars max_Battle: max battle number min_Battle: min battle number max_Wars: max war number min_Wars: min war number
